title: Covering Fire (4U147)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot 2 [Isengard] archers. Plays to your support area. The Free Peoples player may not play archery events or use archery special abilities. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.
Lore:	Archers cowered on the walls, unable to reply.
Rarity:	U
